oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in black ink, 11 lines per page.
Single section sewn through fold as well as around head and tail of the text; leather guards on inside fold.
Folio 152r dated 10 Māhā 1941 s./1884; folio 258r dated 11 Fāgaṇ 1941 s./1884.
Collected from the Kera Dargah of Pīr Ǵulām ʻAlī Shāh.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.
